name: My Date With Kiniko
description:
So here is the story. You're a 10th grader and you just asked out a girl name Kiniko to go on a date with her. She is very happy to hear that you are interested in her so here you are. On a nice Date with Kiniko.

Mulitple choices makes you decide how you want to spend your date with Kiniko. You can go to the movies, Go shopping, Have a meal or have a fun night at a festival. I hope you will make Kiniko happy on your first date with her.
